mapper.select: SELECT C.* FROM (SELECT COMMENT_NO, COMMENT_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(C_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"') C_CREATE_DATE, BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICKNAME, PROFILE_IMG, PARENT_NO, COMMENT_DEL_FL FROM "COMMENT" JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}) C WHERE COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N' START WITH PARENT_NO IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR COMMENT_NO = PARENT_NO ORDER SIBLINGS BY COMMENT_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "COMMENT" c VALUES(SEQ_COMMENT_NO.NEXTVAL,#{commentContent},DEFAULT,DEFAULT,#{boardNo},#{memberNo}, CASE WHEN #{parentNo} > 0 THEN #{parentNo} ELSE NULL END)
mapper.update: UPDATE "COMMENT" SET COMMENT_CONTENT = #{commentContent}, C_CREATE_DATE = DEFAULT WHERE COMMENT_NO = #{commentNo}
